scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run mkdir && npm run build:html && npm run build:css && npm run build:images
scripts.watch: npm run watch:html & npm run watch:css
scripts.build:css: npm run clean:css && lessc --source-map css/main.less build/$npm_package_name.$npm_package_version.css && cp css/*.css build/
scripts.watch:css: npm run build:css && chokidar 'css/**/*.less' -c 'npm run build:css'
scripts.watch:html: npm run build:html && chokidar *.html -c 'npm run build:html'
scripts.build:images: npm run clean:images && cp -R images/ build/
